products.name: Apples
products.description: Apples are rich in vitamin C, fiber, and antioxidants, which help strengthen the immune system and improve digestion.

products.name: Bananas
products.description: Bananas are high in potassium, which helps maintain normal blood pressure, and also contain vitamins B6 and C.

products.name: Pears
products.description: Pears contain fiber, vitamins C and K, which help improve digestion, support skin health, and strengthen the immune system.

products.name: Oranges
products.description: Oranges are rich in vitamin C, which boosts immunity, improves skin health, aids iron absorption, and have antioxidant properties.

products.name: Kiwis
products.description: Kiwis are an excellent source of vitamins C and E, as well as fiber, which promote immune function, skin health, and digestion.

products.name: Pomegranate
products.description: Pomegranate contains powerful antioxidants, vitamins C and K, which support heart health, improve metabolism, and help reduce inflammation.

products.name: Blueberries
products.description: Blueberries are rich in antioxidants and vitamin C, which enhance memory, strengthen the immune system, and support eye health.

products.name: Peaches
products.description: Peaches are an excellent source of vitamins A and C, which support skin health, improve vision, and boost immunity.

products.name: Watermelon
products.description: Watermelon contains a high amount of water, vitamin C, and antioxidants, which help hydrate the body, support heart health, and improve metabolism.

products.name: Spinach
products.description: Spinach is rich in vitamins A, C, and K, and contains antioxidants that support eye and skin health.

products.name: Carrot
products.description: Carrots are an excellent source of vitamin A, important for eye health and the immune system.

products.name: Broccoli
products.description: Broccoli contains vitamins C, K, and A, as well as antioxidants that help maintain immunity and bone health.

products.name: Cabbage
products.description: Cabbage contains vitamins C and K, folic acid, and fiber, which support heart health, strengthen immunity, and improve digestion.

products.name: Tomatoes
products.description: Tomatoes are rich in vitamin C and lycopene, a powerful antioxidant that helps prevent heart disease and cancer.

products.name: Bell Pepper
products.description: Bell peppers contain vitamin C and beta-carotene, which strengthen the immune system, improve skin health, and support vision.

products.name: Pumpkin
products.description: Pumpkin is rich in vitamins A and C, and potassium, which help maintain healthy blood pressure and improve metabolism.

products.name: Zucchini
products.description: Zucchini is a low-calorie vegetable containing vitamins A and C, and potassium that support heart health and normalize blood pressure.

products.name: Green Beans
products.description: Green beans contain fiber, vitamins C and K, and folic acid, which help improve digestion and strengthen the immune system.

products.name: Beetroot
products.description: Beetroot promotes better blood circulation, supports liver health, and helps normalize hemoglobin levels due to its high iron content.

products.name: Walnuts
products.description: Walnuts are rich in omega-3 fatty acids, antioxidants, and vitamins that support heart health, improve memory, and strengthen the immune system.

products.name: Almonds
products.description: Almonds contain vitamins E and B2, magnesium, and fiber, which promote skin health, strengthen bones, and help reduce cholesterol levels.

products.name: Cashews
products.description: Cashews help maintain healthy blood sugar levels, improve bone and skin health due to their high magnesium and copper content.

products.name: Chia Seeds
products.description: Chia seeds are rich in omega-3 fatty acids, fiber, and antioxidants that support heart function, improve digestion, and normalize blood sugar levels.

products.name: Flax Seeds
products.description: Flax seeds are an excellent source of omega-3, fiber, and antioxidants that help improve digestion, reduce inflammation, and support heart health.

products.name: Pistachios
products.description: Pistachios contain antioxidants, vitamins B6 and K, which support cardiovascular health, improve cholesterol levels, and reduce the risk of chronic diseases.

products.name: Pumpkin Seeds
products.description: Pumpkin seeds are rich in magnesium, zinc, and antioxidants, which support skin health, boost the immune system, and improve heart function.

products.name: Pine Nuts
products.description: Pine nuts contain vitamins B and E, magnesium, and proteins that support immunity, strengthen bones, and help normalize blood sugar levels.

products.name: Sunflower Seeds
products.description: Sunflower seeds are a source of vitamin E, magnesium, and antioxidants, which help improve skin health, maintain normal cholesterol levels, and support blood pressure regulation.

products.name: Pecans
products.description: Pecans are rich in monounsaturated fats and antioxidants that help support heart health, improve cholesterol levels, and normalize metabolism.

products.name: Chicken Breast
products.description: Chicken breast is an excellent source of protein, low in calories, and rich in B vitamins. It promotes muscle growth and repair, supports normal energy levels, and strengthens the immune system.

products.name: Lean Beef
products.description: Beef is a valuable source of high-quality protein, iron, and B vitamins, including vitamin B12. It helps maintain healthy blood, normalizes energy levels, and promotes muscle growth.

products.name: Turkey
products.description: Turkey meat is low in calories but rich in protein, B vitamins, and selenium. It supports heart health, strengthens immunity, and aids tissue repair after physical activity.

products.name: Rabbit
products.description: Rabbit meat contains a lot of protein and little fat. It is rich in phosphorus and B vitamins, which help normalize metabolism, improve nervous system function, and support bone health.

products.name: Lean Lamb
products.description: Lean lamb is high in protein, zinc, iron, and B vitamins. It helps tissue repair, improves metabolism, and supports blood health.

products.name: Olive Oil
products.description: Olive oil is a source of monounsaturated fats beneficial for cardiovascular health. It is also rich in antioxidants (vitamins E and K) and has anti-inflammatory properties. Regular consumption helps improve cholesterol levels and supports skin health.

products.name: Coconut Oil
products.description: Coconut oil contains medium-chain triglycerides (MCTs), which may improve metabolism and boost energy levels. It also promotes skin and hair health and has antibacterial properties.

products.name: Flaxseed Oil
products.description: Flaxseed oil is rich in omega-3 fatty acids that help reduce inflammation, improve brain function, and support heart health. It may also enhance the condition of skin and hair.

products.name: Avocado Oil
products.description: Avocado oil is a source of monounsaturated fats and vitamins E and K. It helps reduce cholesterol levels, improves skin health, reduces inflammation, and supports heart function.
